title: Total international travellers entering the country in Canada 2021
summary: This line chart plots the Total number of foreign travelers entering Canada over the year of 2021 .
The number of travelers starts at around 1002245.0 percent in January , but then between February and April , the number plummets down to less than 1002245.0 % .
Then , until December , the number remains steady , only rising slightly past 1002245.0 million by the end of the year .
